t: Amazon.com: EverDrive GB X3 : Video Games
s: My issue is that there is a known error with Sandisk brand SD cards just flat out not working, I ended up having to use the unbranded SD card that came with my DS R4 card and putting the Sandisk card in that instead. Definitely a genuine Krikzz product though I will note that the version I received did not match the picture on amazon and instead matched the clear version found on the Krikzz website as it is newer.
